channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ICE arrests of Afghans are on the rise in the wake of National Guard attack, immigration lawyers say
item.description: Immigration lawyers and authorities say arrests of Afghans are on the rise following the shooting of two National Guard members in Washington, D.C. Th...

item.title: Florida to execute man convicted in 1989 home invasion killing
item.description: Mark Allen Geralds is scheduled to be executed Tuesday evening in Florida

item.title: Supreme Court weighs Republican appeal to end limits on party spending in federal elections
item.description: The Supreme Court is considering a Republican-led drive, backed by President Donald Trump’s administration, to overturn a quarter-century-old decision...

item.title: World must jointly tackle issues of climate change, pollution, UN says
item.description: The United Nations says the world needs a new way of thinking about environmental crises threatening the health of people and the planet

item.title: Georgia O'Keeffe's views of the New Mexico desert will be preserved with conservation plan
